hibernate-mapping.query: select count(vm) from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy inner join hy.virtualmachines vm where pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine and vm.idType = 1

select count(vm) from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.VirtualappHB vapp, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.VirtualDataCenterHB vdc, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.NodeVirtualImageHB nvi, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.NodeHB n inner join pm.hypervisor hy inner join hy.virtualmachines vm where pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine and vm.idVm = nvi.virtualMachineHB.idVm AND n.idNode = nvi.idNode AND n.idVirtualApp = vapp.idVirtualApp AND vdc.idVirtualDataCenter = vapp.virtualDataCenterHB.idVirtualDataCenter and vm.idType = 1 and vdc.enterpriseHB.idEnterprise != :identerprise

select vm from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy inner join hy.virtualmachines vm where pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine

select vm from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy inner join hy.virtualmachines vm where vm.idType = 1 and pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine
select hy.ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy where pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine
select hy.ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy
select pm from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy where hy.ip = :ipPhysicalMachine and pm.dataCenter = :idDataCenter

select vm from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor hy inner join hy.virtualmachines vm where pm.idPhysicalMachine = :idphysicalmachine and vm.idType != 1
select pm from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.datastoresHB ds where ds.idDatastore = :idDatastore
select distinct(pm) from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm where pm.rack.idRack = :idRack

select distinct(pm) from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm where pm.rack.idRack = :idRack and ( pm.name like :filterLike or pm in ( Select pms from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pms, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.user.EnterpriseHB ent where pms.idEnterprise = ent.idEnterprise and ent.name like :filterLike ) )

SELECT pm FROM com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm inner join pm.hypervisor h, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.VirtualDataCenterHB vdc WHERE h.type = vdc.hypervisorType AND pm.rack.idRack = :idRack AND vdc.idVirtualDataCenter = :idVirtualDataCenter

SELECT pm FROM com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB pm, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.virtualappliance.VirtualDataCenterHB vdc, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.HypervisorHB h JOIN pm.dataCenter dc WHERE pm = h.physicalMachine AND h.type = vdc.hypervisorType AND dc.idDataCenter = vdc.idDataCenter AND pm.rack.idRack = :idRack AND vdc.idVirtualDataCenter = :idVirtualDataCenter AND pm.idState = 3 AND pm.idPhysicalMachine in ( SELECT py.idPhysicalMachine FROM com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.DatastoreHB datastore, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.infrastructure.PhysicalmachineHB py WHERE (datastore.size - datastore.usedSize) > :hdRequiredOnRepository AND py in elements(datastore.pmList) AND datastore.size > datastore.usedSize ) AND pm.idPhysicalMachine not in ( SELECT DISTINCT vm.hypervisor.physicalMachine.idPhysicalMachine FROM VirtualmachineHB vm WHERE (vm.enterpriseHB IN( SELECT rule.enterprise2 FROM EnterpriseExclusionRuleHB rule WHERE rule.enterprise1 = :enterprise )) OR (vm.enterpriseHB IN( SELECT rule.enterprise1 FROM EnterpriseExclusionRuleHB rule WHERE rule.enterprise2 = :enterprise )) )
